products.title: Origin, Basic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Origin, Magnolia - Venetian Blind
products.description: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

products.title: Origin, Black - Venetian Blind
products.description: Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings can look simple and sophisticated. Set the black against white walls in a modern living room and complement with bright limes or fruity oranges for a step away from monochromatic living and towards boldness and colour.

products.title: Origin, Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might.

products.title: Origin, Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark slate in colour, the origin grey is comprised of satin-finish, heavy gauge aluminium slats, high quality pull-cords, and a clear wand tilt, resulting in a streamlined, contemporary blind. Given that the grey shade will match a multitude of hues, this is an obvious choice for those who like to change their dcor often. Go industrial in the kitchen by pairing the grey with worn metals, rustic woods, and slate floor tiles.

products.title: Origin, Ultramarine - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin ultra marine is a stand-out blue blind, with a gloss finish on strong aluminium slats. Made from only high quality materials, from the slats right through to the pull-cords, this blind is made for durability and hardiness. Take your bathroom to the seaside by coupling with pale, icy blues and pure, bright whites; or give a plain, neutral hallway or utility room a big splash of dazzling colour, offset by whites and silvers in ornaments, frames, and fittings.

products.title: Origin, Matt Red - Venetian Blind
products.description: Brilliantly bold, the origin in matt red will inject life and colour into even the dullest of rooms. The satin-finish slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, which can be adjusted to your liking using the coordinating cords. You'll love the effect the matt red has on an all-white contemporary kitchen, where it can be beautifully complemented by silver fixtures and fittings such as taps, cupboard handles, and the like.

products.title: Origin, Mocha - Venetian Blind
products.description: Creamy and rich, the satin-finish origin mocha is a luxury-lover's dream. Work the adjustable slats to your heart's content, either to let the light in or keep it out, without worrying about over-use, as this durable aluminium blind is built to last. Streamline your kitchen by taking advantage of the mocha's colour-coordinated slats, cords, and rails, and pair with deeper browns or pretty turquoises to craft a refreshing and inspiring colour scheme that your guests won't be able to resist commenting on.

products.title: Origin, Hunter Green - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark and unusual, the origin in hunter green offers a perfect satin finish on slim aluminium slats, within a matching frame, and controlled using coordinating pull-cords, making this the perfect blind for both pleasure and function. For a country aesthetic with a modern twist, work the hunter green into a warm kitchen colour scheme, complementing with terracottas, soft yellows, and creams. Or make a real statement in a contemporary living room by placing it against white walls and light-coloured woods.

products.title: Origin White Thermal Blackout Roller Blind
products.description: Origin thermal blackout is a 100% polyester fabric, suitable for use throughout the home. Origin blackout has the added benefit of a white thermal blackout backing which not only cuts the light coming into your room but helps keep in the heat. Origin white thermal blackout roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

Origin cream thermal blackout roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.description: Origin thermal blackout is a 100% polyester fabric, suitable for use throughout the home. Origin blackout has the added benefit of a white thermal blackout backing which not only cuts the light coming into your room but helps keep in the heat. Origin beige thermal blackout roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Origin Grey Thermal Blackout Roller Blind
products.description: Origin thermal blackout is a 100% polyester fabric, suitable for use throughout the home. Origin blackout has the added benefit of a white thermal blackout backing which not only cuts the light coming into your room but helps keep in the heat. Origin grey thermal blackout roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Origin Black Thermal Blackout Roller Blind
products.description: Origin thermal blackout is a 100% polyester fabric, suitable for use throughout the home. Origin blackout has the added benefit of a white thermal blackout backing which not only cuts the light coming into your room but helps keep in the heat. Origin black thermal blackout roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Bright Orange - Roller Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) range offers the latest in light-blocking window coverings, and the bright orange is no different. But it isn't substance over style here; the bright, eye-catching hue will make a statement wherever its used. The rich, summery glow of the bright orange adds an energised quality and isn't for the shy and retiring. By fixing this blind in the bedroom, you can wake up to this sunshine glow every morning, no matter the weather.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Bumblebee - Roller Blind
products.description: Bumblebee from their ever-popular origin (blackout) range is one of those fabrics that you have to see to believe. It's so much more than another warm yellow because it actually feels like it radiates warmth and cheer around the room. Perfect when you want to bring small rooms and compact spaces to life instantly. The beauty of bumblebee is that you can use it in just about any setting. In the bedroom it mimics the glow of the summer sun first thing in the morning, and in the kitchen it provides that spark of inspiration you need when you want to create something delicious.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Mix practicality with style by featuring the quality origin (blackout) in oyster grey within your home. Being a quality blackout blind, this blind can help you and your family to get the best night's sleep possible by blocking out the night-time light and summertime sun. Complement the delectable oyster grey with a harmonising combination of coffee and cream tones to produce a warm and welcoming room full of soothing colour.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: Combat those long nights of disturbed sleep by opting for the origin (blackout) in taupe, a quality blackout blind with modern style and opulent colour. This blind will shields against both night-time light and summer-time sun, making it a practical choice as well as a pleasing one. Compliment the taupe with a mild and elegant dcor scheme featuring ivory, biscuit, and caramel hues. Include plenty of compelling textures and sumptuous cloths to create a comforting realm, adding golden embellishments and gilded accessories for a modern, metallic edge to a traditional scheme.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Whisper - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin whisper is a blackout fabric unlike any other. It combines gentle hints of beige and light grey that will add understated chic styling to any contemporary home. This is truly a fabric that is willing to break the mould to add something subtly different you won't find anywhere else. Think back to some of the visuals you've fallen in love with over the years, and ask yourself what they all had in common? No matter the question, whisper is the answer because of the way it enables you to weave in half a dozen other colours without losing direction.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Amour - Roller Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout)'s amour truly is the colour of love. A pale yet memorable pink, this pretty hue and lightweight fabric conceals just how sturdy and durable this blind really is, making it the perfect blind for a window that gets plenty of use. Couple with sweet florals or cute stripes and checks for a lovely, welcoming look in a child's bedroom, home office, or kitchen. The colour will work perfectly with the ultra-fashionable shabby chic look when paired with vintage-style furniture and fifties-style patterns.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Dark Purple - Roller Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in dark purple is just that - a high quality, fabric blind that keeps outside light at bay, in a dark, contemporary purple shade. Its sleek, smooth material makes it easy to roll up and down, and is lightweight yet durable to suit plenty of use. To create a moody yet modern look in a bedroom, pair with white walls and dark woods, or with beige neutrals and rich creams for something a little more luxurious.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Jade - Roller Blind
products.description: Standing back and admiring origin (blackout) in jade is an experience unlike any other. It's a deep and thought-provoking green that makes you feel at ease the moment you set eyes on it. All it needs is the perfect matching secondary colour and it'll form the bedrock for some stunning new decor. Take your time to get the balance right and you won't be disappointed. Matching to jade is about choosing between softer reds or more electric blues.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Graphite - Roller Blind
products.description: The slate shade of the origin (blackout) in graphite is about as contemporary a colour as you can get, and its high quality blackout properties make it practical as well as stylish, as do its durable yet lightweight fabric and easy-to-use rolling mechanism. Use amongst bold reds or cool blues in your home office, or give a rustic living room or dining room a modern twist. This blind will look particularly good when paired with light to medium woods and off-white walls.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Flamingo - Roller Blind
products.description: The flamingo from the origin (blackout) has nothing if not attitude. This funky fuchsia shade is bold and daring, perfect for brightening up your home. Don't forget though, this blind is more than just good-looking; it's also practical, hardwearing, and easy-to-use. This hot pink shade will sit perfectly against dark purples, pale pinks, or stark whites, and is perfect for a funky bedroom, bright home office, or accented hallway.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Hazel - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin (blackout) hazel is a fabric that's true to its name and more than happy in any contemporary home. It's that gentle woody brown that really lifts the depth and character of a room to new heights that we love, and we know you're going to fall in love with it too. Take your time when figuring out how to work hazel into your chosen space by thinking about ways you can pair it with deep creams and sandy beiges.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Bali - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to feel at peace and at ease, nothing compares to the soothing tones of origin (blackout) bali. The dreamy blue has just a hint of grassy green thrown in for good measure -just what you need when it's time to lie back and take it all in. If you love the idea of chilling out as the sun goes down, there's probably nowhere better than the conservatory for your new blind. It's all about keeping the colour scheme relaxed and a little bit vibrant, so look for shades that match bali and you won't go far wrong.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Magnolia - Roller Blind
products.description: Pale and neutral, the origin (blackout) in magnolia brings out the best in all colours, and sits on a soft, smooth fabric. As well as being fine and malleable, this blind is a powerful blackout fabric that is durable and will last year upon year. The magnolia will complement almost any shade, and can be used as a central feature in a brown or neutral colour scheme in a bedroom or living room. Or instead, set it amongst greens or blues for a refreshing, calming look in the bathroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Charcoal - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin in charcoal is a blackout fabric with a difference that's been specially made for those of you who love the contemporary look of this on-trend shade of grey. Deep, earthy, and by far the best way to put your mind at ease at the end of long day. Matching with light woody browns would be an inspired way to continue the natural colour scheme around the room with the click of a button. It's all about feeling peaceful and free, so add in a few throws on the couches and a beanbag in the corner.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: Light pollution is a recognised problem in many homes, so include the revolutionary and modern origin (blackout) in snow within any decor scheme for a beneficial blind with contemporary colour. The origin (blackout) is a quality crafted collection of blackout blinds that mix both practicality with style, and the gorgeous snow offers this along with cool, clean whiteness. Match the snow with bold blocks of dove grey, cobalt, and alike whites to form a current decor style with contemporary colours.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Spun Pearl - Roller Blind
products.description: The elegant neutrality of the origin (blackout)'s spun pearl brings warmth and sophistication wherever it's used. This taupe coloured blind is made from sturdy, high quality fabric that offers the latest in blackout technology, making it the perfect choice for keeping out harmful uv rays. The spun pearl will add style and grace to a cream and gold dcor scheme in a classic yet contemporary living room or bedroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Ozark - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take one look at origin (blackout) ozark you come to appreciate all of the different creative paths that it opens up for your new interior design project. It's a gentle earthy grey that invites you in to put your feet up, and isn't shy about adding some contemporary style to the mixing put either. When you want to create a space you never want to leave it's certainly worth looking at beiges and light browns to match with ozark.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Chambray - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, dark blue of the origin (blackout) in chambray is one of elegance and royalty, and can induce a moody or a regal feel depending on what it's paired with. Its sleek, cutting edge finish makes it a pleasure to use and means it will stand the test of time, just like its colour. Use in the bedroom alongside dark woods and gold trims for a regal, stately look, or pair with light and dark greys and off-whites in the dining room or home office for a contemporary but moody feel.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Coffee - Roller Blind
products.description: Light pollution is a recognised problem in many households, so feature the popular origin (blackout) in coffee in your bedroom for some well-deserved rest. This simple addition will help to shield the room against the night-time light, whilst fitting in most window spaces perfectly, and adding some brilliance to your dcor. Merge the coffee with a rich and captivating combination of cream, caramel, and cocoa hues, creating a comforting space full of warming tones.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Ebony - Roller Blind
products.description: Blinds don't get much more blackout than the darkest of dark shade of the origin (blackout) in ebony. This ultra-black blind has a sleek, quality finish to its fabric, and its well-made rolling mechanism make it long-lasting and simple to use. We all know that black goes with anything, but to really make the ebony pop, set it against reds and whites for a modern-chic style living room or dining room.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Illusion - Roller Blind
products.description: Pretty in rosy pink, the origin (blackout)'s illusion is an attractive and appealing shade, combining all of the benefits of a blackout blind with a contemporary, pretty look. It's deceptively sturdy, enough so that it can handle plenty of day-to-day use. Nestle the illusion amongst whites, creams, and paler pinks to create a candy-coloured dream bedroom. Or go for something a little different by placing it in a bathroom; after all, who says bathrooms have to be aqua? We certainly don't.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Riptide - Roller Blind
products.description: Is it blue or is it grey? Or perhaps it has a hint of mint green in it? The chameleon-like origin (blackout) riptide will get your guests talking, and whilst it's doing that will still be offering a sleek, robust window covering that blocks light easily. Nestle the riptide amongst aqua blues and turquoises to bring out the fresh iciness of this blind. It's the perfect hue for a green or blue bathroom, or would work well as a subtle accent colour in a light and airy white bedroom or hallway.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Shield against the night-time light and bright, summertime sun with the origin (blackout) in crimson, a quality blackout blind that fits perfectly in any window size. This plush red shade is sure to brighten your home, whilst simultaneously adding a modern edge with its simple rolling mechanism. Form a romantic and attractive dcor by featuring the crimson amongst an assortment of dainty florals and delicate details.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Lime - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for an explosion of natural colour that you'll fall in love with the moment you see it, look no further than the free-flowing colour that is origin (blackout) in lime. The green seems to jump off the fabric and dart all over the place. Just what you want when you're trying to reinvent your use of space. We love the idea of using lime in the kitchen so that you can introduce some natural energy to the heart of the home.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, opaque cream of the origin (blackout) in oyster gives you the best of both worlds; all of the benefits of a high quality blackout blind, while still maintaining a light, window-like feel. The smooth, hardy fabric means it's also built to last, not just for show. Cream, of course, will match almost any colour scheme, but will look particularly good in a traditionally styled neutral living room, surrounded by browns and golds, or pitted against bolder colours in a bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Sky - Roller Blind
products.description: The vivid blue of the origin (blackout)'s sky is a sight to behold, being even more sky-blue than anything outside can offer. This bright tone will bring the outside in, even when it's blacking out the sun from outside. For a bold, playful look in a playroom or child's bedroom, match the sky with a colourful wallpaper full of greens, yellows, and oranges. Alternatively, add to a white or cream home office for a striking look and a clean, contemporary feel.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Steel - Roller Blind
products.description: The light, pastel shade of the origin (blackout) in steel adds a perfectly neutral accent to any window. Its cutting edge blackout properties mean that it will keep out even the brightest rays from the sun, yet you won't be compromising on style. The steel contrasts wonderfully with its sister browns and beiges, yet also tempers bolder colours such as burgundy or emerald when needed. Use to complement contemporary patterns in the kitchen or bold blues or greens in the bathroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to add a subtle stone grey to the mix that has a hint of urban chic, origin stone is the fabric that makes it possible. It's more than just a unique touch of style, and thanks to the blackout fabric it allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. The perfect marriage of style and functionality. Taking your time is the way to create spaces you love, so why not give your new project some extra thought? Lightly sanded floors, magnolia walls, and striking wall art to finish everything off.

products.title: Origin, City Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: City grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home. The steely character of the grey is softened by the sleek finishing and smooth surfaces of the wooden slats to create a homely addition that will enhance any space. Origin, city grey - venetian blind city grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home.

products.title: Origin, Champagne - Venetian Blind
products.description: Origin champagne is the touch of natural luxury that you have been searching for. With every slat created by masters of their craft you have the perfect canvas for the gentle fizzle of this off-white masterpiece. The touch of luxury and effortless style that every home deserves. Origin, champagne - venetian blind origin champagne is the touch of natural luxury that you have been searching for.

products.title: Origin, Warm Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: This time in warm oak, the origin range delivers high quality basswood slats sourced from ecologically responsible forests. The blind comes with a matching pelmet, bottom rail, and acorns for a slick and streamlined aesthetic. Add some natural style to even the most contemporary of settings by including the warm oak in an all-white bedroom, using the blind and wooden furniture to provide the only colour in the room.

products.title: Origin, Seashell White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Seashell white instantly brings your mind back to the purity and calmness of the coastline. With everything in life taken care of at its own speed, all that is left for you to do is lie back and take in the unique aesthetic as you get the rest and relaxation you have been searching for. The perfect blend of sleek finish and gentle colouring. Origin, seashell white - venetian blind seashell white instantly brings your mind back to the purity and calmness of the coastline.

products.title: Origin, Cream - Day Night Blind
products.description: The ultimate neutral, the origin's cream is light, airy, and versatile in colour, and sleek and shapely in form. The smooth threads are tightly woven to create a sturdy yet lightweight fabric, and the sliding netting is simple and translucent. Meld the cream with peach and coral tones for an unconventional, yet cheerful and pretty, look in the family bathroom. Choose white walls and peach or coral tiling, accessorising with matching towels, wall art, and trinkets.

products.title: Origin, Pewter - Day Night Blind
products.description: The fabric of the slate grey origin pewter is sleek and modern, allowing for a clean and streamlined look and easy workability. The controls and brackets are tucked neatly into the overhead rail cassette, affording the blind extra tidiness and attractiveness. Place the pewter against pure white walls in the living room and add matching grey throws and cushions throughout the room. Choose a bright shade, such as zesty lime, funky satsuma, or cobalt blue, to add bursts of colour throughout the room.

products.title: Origin, White - Day Night Blind
products.description: Using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on your light and privacy needs. Settle the white against a red feature wall in the dining room, pairing with wooden floors and contemporary wooden furniture. Include plenty of reds and whites throughout the room, perhaps in place mats and crockery, to bring the look together.

products.title: Origin, Dark Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: In dark, grey-toned brown, the origin in dark brown is a deep yet neutral blind that will match a range of dcor schemes, colour palettes, and woods. With movable strips for light and privacy, hidden controls and brackets, and a sleek and impactful design, this blind is the height of luxury. Use the dark brown as part of a neutral colour scheme, surrounding it with white, cream, or ivory walls and furniture and accessories in cocoas, mochas, and taupes.

products.title: Origin, Taupe Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: In a delicate stone shade, the origin taupe grey is subtle and unassuming. Its clean, contemporary fabric has a smooth, touchable texture and is double-layered to home netted strips that can be raised and lowered to allow more or less light into the room. Create an industrial look in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the taupe grey amidst cobalt blue or slate grey walls, perhaps including a brick-look wallpaper for a fun effect.

products.title: Origin, Medium Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: A contemporary shade of grey, the origin's medium grey is sleek and clean with an industrial edge. For complete versatility, the sliding strip of netting can be moved up and down to allow more or less light into the room whilst still retaining privacy. Use the medium grey as part of a strong, moody dcor scheme in an older child's bedroom, framing it with stark white or pale grey walls. Add distinctive metallic furniture, in materials such as steel and wire, to add a real sense of style to the room.

products.title: Origin, Black - Day Night Blind
products.description: In sleek ebony, the origin in black is flawlessly chic. The blind comprises of a smooth, contemporary double layering of jet black fabric, which hosts a sliding strip of black striped netting, and an overhead rail cassette containing the controls and brackets. Fuse the black with a sunny yellow for a cool and fashionable look in a teenager's bedroom. Stick to a base of pure white walls, and use a mixture of black and lemon for the bedlinen, wall hangings, and ornaments.

products.title: Origin, Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: The origin brown consists of a milky coffee-toned fabric, smooth with just the faintest of textures, and similarly shaded threading through a translucent netting. Brackets and controls are hidden neatly away in the overhead rail cassette, yet are easily accessible as needed. Team the brown with a rich burnt orange for a cosy, autumnal colour scheme in a dining room or living room. Choose dark, polished furniture to complement the look, and accent with plush fabrics, such as thick wools and smooth chenilles, for warmth and charm.

products.title: Origin, African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.description: Sleek and elegant in jet black, the origin's african blackwood offers streamlined modernity yet with all of the quality and practicality of real wood. Their basswood is sourced from ecologically responsible, sustainable forests, and provides a high standard of finish. For the ultimate in contemporary style, feature the african blackwood amidst a sunny yellow scheme, painting the walls to contrast with the ebony tone.

products.title: Origin, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: Solitaire is a gentle infusion of white and light grey that flow into one another to create a delicate tone that adds a natural touch to any home. To accent the subtle colour we have crafted light and finely honed wooden slats that hang effortlessly in any space. Perfect for adding that gentle atmosphere of relaxation that makes a house a home. Origin, solitaire - venetian blind solitaire is a gentle infusion of white and light grey that flow into one another to create a delicate tone that adds a natural touch to any home.

products.title: Origin, Cosmopolitan Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cosmopolitan grey from the origin range is a light contemporary tone that allows you to add a depth of colour to any space without sacrificing your light and airy look and feel. The finely crafted slats work in perfect harmony with the subtle stylings of this unique tone to create a visual that will live long in the memory. Origin, cosmopolitan grey - venetian blind cosmopolitan grey from the origin range is a light contemporary tone that allows you to add a depth of colour to any space without sacrificing your light and airy look and feel.

products.title: Origin, Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: Classically elegant, the origin in old walnut displays a dark-toned finish on the responsibly sourced basswood typical of this range. A heavy duty headrail is specially designed to hold the weight of the wood and all components are formed from high quality materials. Mix the traditional with the contemporary by including the old walnut in a modernly styled dining room, blending with pale sage walls and white trim.

products.title: Origin, Charcoal Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Charcoal grey is a powerful and eye-catching tone that will inject a presence into any room or space. The earthy quality of the colour is matched beautifully by the minimalist finishing of the slats to create a simple yet striking visual that captures the eye the moment you enter. Origin, charcoal grey - venetian blind charcoal grey is a powerful and eye-catching tone that will inject a presence into any room or space.

products.title: Origin, Bright White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pure and simple in colour, the origin bright white is just as sleek and streamlined in design. Thick wooden slats, formed from ecologically managed basswood, accompany high quality components in matching white, so that you can be sure of a coordinated look offering style and coherency. The bright white will look simply striking against almost any bolder colour, but for a traditionally coastal colour scheme in the bathroom, why not team with bright teals and aquas? Keep the base of the room white and use the gorgeous green-blues to accessorise.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Riptide - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in riptide features a lightweight, malleable fabric and a gorgeously cool, icy shade of blue. Adjustable louvres protect you from light disturbances and excess heat as and when you need it; simply tilt or move aside as you please. Group with bright whites and the subtlest of silvers in a modern, calming home office or dining room, where light woods will suit it best. Or insert some subtle colour into your hallway or landing, without overpowering any existing dcor choices.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Ebony - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in ebony is the deepest, darkest black, which will make it a strong contender for attention in your room. Its blackout properties, manoeuvrable louvres, and smooth, high quality fabric just serve to add to the appeal of this sleek window covering. Accentuate lime green or orange shades in a teen's bedroom or your home office by settling the ebony amongst them to craft a monochromatic colour scheme with a colour-popping twist.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Spun Pearl - Vertical Blind
products.description: Origin (blackout)'s spun pearl is a strong and vivid shade of grey that will work hard to offset other, brighter colours. The simple, smooth texture of the fabric creates easily movable louvres, which can be adjusted at will to allow as much or as little light in as you like. Use in a chic, contemporary home office with plenty of whites or creams, and the occasional hint of silver every now and again.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Snow - Vertical Blind
products.description: The beneficial and beautiful origin (blackout) in snow features a valuable blackout attribute, which allows you to conquer the night-time light. This quality blind creates a modern look with its brilliant white shading and contemporary, changeable louvres for the added bonus of your privacy and shading preferences. Use the snow in your master bedroom to benefit from its hidden blackout quality. Match the stark white of the blind with a creative, colourful wallpaper or simple, chalky pink paint.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Crimson - Vertical Blind
products.description: The sleek and pliable origin (blackout) in crimson a gorgeously brave red, on a hardwearing blackout fabric. Its effective blackout properties and easy-to-use adjustable louvres make this a fantastically practical choice, without compromising on looks. Make a feature of the crimson by setting it against dazzling white walls and dark furniture, although most tones of wood will work well with this blind.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Sky - Vertical Blind
products.description: The functional style of the origin (blackout) in sky gives you the best of both worlds when it comes to taste, class, and workability. The soft, supple fabric is of the highest quality, and is formed into slim louvres that are easy to move and tilt as you please. The traditional room for a blue might be the bathroom, but why not team the sky with yellows and whites in the dining room instead? Or grouping together with paler shades of blue in the guest bedroom or home office? With the versatility of the sky, the possibilities are infinite.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Magnolia - Vertical Blind
products.description: The soft neutrality of the origin (blackout) in magnolia brings to mind rich dessert cream, and its fine, smooth surface is soft to the touch. As well as being pleasing to the eye, this blind has effective blackout properties, and is made from a high quality, lasting fabric. The magnolia is the perfect neutral, and can be set amongst almost any colour scheme. Use amongst browns in the living room for a traditional look; plums in the dining room for moody cosiness; or blues in the bathroom for freshness and tranquillity.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Navy - Vertical Blind
products.description: Go navy with this rich, dark blue offering from the origin (blackout) range. This is a deep, classic shade that adds a touch of sophistication wherever it's placed, whilst continuing to add the functionality and pragmatism that you will come to expect from the origin range. This dark shade of blue will make white walls look even cleaner and crisper, and this traditional colour scheme can be accented with silver fixtures and fittings in the kitchen, along with light woods and worktops.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Graphite - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in graphite gives a fantastically contemporary effect that is so versatile that it can be paired with almost any colour scheme. Made from high quality, lightweight fabric that is durable and long-lasting, this is a functional option as well as a chic one. Accent with silvers and whites for a modern living room; team with a bold red to make a statement in the dining room; or create a feature window in a white or cream hallway.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Steel - Vertical Blind
products.description: The smooth neutral of the origin (blackout) steel is a versatile shade of grey-beige that works well with almost any colour it comes across. The quality blackout fabric works well as adjustable louvres, which can be moved according to how much light you want in your room. Complement a rich burgundy for a traditional colour scheme in the lounge or den, or pair with browns and taupes for a cosy, modern feel in the kitchen.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Flamingo - Vertical Blind
products.description: Add a touch of vigour to a dim window with the origin (blackout) in flamingo. This supple blind has a smooth feel and neatly hanging louvres that can be tilted or moved according to how much light you want to let into the room. Make the flamingo stand out by placing in a white bathroom or kitchen, with only colour-coordinated accessories to accent the deep pink colour. Or use in a child's bedroom, amongst baby pinks, soft whites, and contemporary florals.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Illusion - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in illusion is a light, agile fabric in a candy pink colour, making it both striking in appearance and easily usable. Gently tilt the louvres to allow the light to pour through, or close again to keep it out - whichever you choose, it will be quick and easy to do. Hang the illusion in a vintage-style kitchen, accented by off-white walls and shabby chic furniture. Decorate with old retro advert posters in complementary colours, and you'll have the most fashionable kitchen around.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Taupe - Vertical Blind
products.description: A dark taupe in colour, the appropriately named origin (blackout) taupe is a wonderfully tactile, cotton-feel fabric that you'll find you just love to touch. Regardless of its forgiving feel, the high quality fabric is hardwearing and resilient, effortlessly serving its purpose as a proficient blackout blind. For warm, welcoming atmosphere, place the taupe against your kitchen window, surrounded by soft creams and the occasional darker brown.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Chambray - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in chambray is a bright and brave hue that will keep out light disturbances whilst adding an attractive feature piece to your room. The smooth texture of the quality fabric used is perfect for its moveable louvres, which can be tilted at ease. This contemporary blue shade will add a splash of colour to an otherwise neutral bathroom or kitchen, making for a cool, calm, and collected environment.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Bright Orange - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in bright orange boasts a flame-coloured fabric that hangs neatly in louvres that are easily adjustable for light and privacy. This blind will certainly steal the show, no matter where it's placed, so why not take a walk on the wild side and make a statement in your home? For a warm, vibrant look in a cosy den, combine the bright orange with off-white walls and accenting accessories.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Dark Purple - Vertical Blind
products.description: The deep shade of the origin (blackout) in dark purple can't help but be the star of the show, with its smooth texture and lightweight feel. Let the outside in, or keep it out, by adjusting the louvres accordingly. Set the dark purple against pale cream walls and bring the colour to life with occasional silver ornaments, frames, and fittings. Or instead, give your hallway or landing a boost of colour to add depth and intrigue to magnolia or beige walls.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster - Vertical Blind
products.description: The oyster blind, from the origin (blackout) range, is subtlety at its best. The soft cream fabric radiates luxurious sophistication, whilst still maintaining a confident neutrality that helps it to match almost any colour. For a country, shaker-style kitchen, sit the oyster amongst matching cream units, with wooden worktops and rustic furniture, accompanied by pretty florals and vintage-style appliances.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Coffee - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in coffee is indeed a deep coffee shade of brown, and forms an effective blackout blind with its durable, opaque fabric. Neat louvres hang from the rail and can be tilted and moved as you please - or indeed as the sun dictates. Group the coffee with hues of the same ilk, such as pale cappuccinos and soft mochas, to create the perfect colour scheme for the kitchen, where you'll be drinking your morning tea.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Amour - Vertical Blind
products.description: A delicate pale pink and a sprightly, light fabric come together here to form the origin (blackout) in amour, a romantic and pretty vertical blind. The lightweight louvres can be moved across and tilted to suit your needs, and are durable and long-lasting in quality. The amour will create an ethereal, romantic vibe when paired with dainty country florals in a bedroom, and is best complemented by creams and whites, along with stronger pink shades.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: So subtle in colour that it's barely there, the origin (blackout) in oyster grey offers just a hint of colour to blend in beautifully with existing dcor. Despite its understated texture and hue, this is a mighty blackout blind, ideal for blocking out the outside light. For a neutral look in a home office or bedroom, team the oyster grey with taupes and soft greys, to add calm and serenity to your home.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Champagne - Venetian Blind
products.description: Champagne is one of the latest additions to their ever-popular origin deluxe range, and one that is sure to transform the way you think about combining style and substance in your home. The finely crafted slats work in perfect harmony with the gentle fizzle of the colouring and the assortment of accompanying fixtures to create a unique visual that is truly something to savour. Origin deluxe, champagne - venetian blind champagne is one of the latest additions to their ever-popular origin deluxe range, and one that is sure to transform the way you think about combining style and substance in your home.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Seashell White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other. The subtle use of colour and the effortlessly smooth texture evoke memories of relaxing down by the coast. Origin deluxe, seashell white - venetian blind seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, City Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor. The depth and striking finish of the steely grey work in perfect harmony with the gently crafted wooden slats and the assortment of unique complimentary fixtures and features. Origin deluxe, city grey - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Warm Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light yet, true to its name, warm, the origin deluxe's warm oak has a truly natural look to it, and the coated basswood, which is ecologically sourced, is durable and high quality. This luxury edition includes coordinating ladder tapes that are used to hold and control the thick, substantial slats. Combine rustic style with contemporary chic by partnering the organic yet modern warm oak with natural slates and white painted wickers.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: A traditionally coloured blind, the origin deluxe in old walnut displays a dark-medium wood with a natural, matt finish. The wooden slats hang from a matching wooden pelmet and are backed with coordinating ladder tapes, so that there is no distraction from the beauty of this piece. Embrace the inherent class of the old walnut and group it with similarly traditional colours and furnishings. For a simple yet effective style in the living room, opt for cream walls and sofas, and wooden flooring and furniture.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Charcoal Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing. By bringing the two together in perfect harmony, and adding a selection of easy on the eye fixtures, it creates a striking visual that will set the tone for the rest of your decor. Origin deluxe, charcoal grey - venetian blind charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual. By combining bespoke craft with a natural tone, every slat brings an air of relaxation that will instantly make you and your guests feel at home. Origin deluxe, solitaire - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Cosmopolitan Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cosmopolitan grey is one of the most popular choices from their origin deluxe range, and with good reason. With a unique tone that allows you to create a homely and relaxing atmosphere in any room, it brings with it a sense of balance and poise that will allow you to add new depth and character to your decor in an instant. Origin deluxe, cosmopolitan grey - venetian blind cosmopolitan grey is one of the most popular choices from their origin deluxe range, and with good reason.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ultimate in luxury, the origin deluxe african blackwood offers all of the style and functionality of the standard range, yet with a cool, designer look, with its thick louvres and sleek, jet black finish. And, as well as a matching pelmet and rail, it comes with coordinated, high quality ladder tapes. There is no colour combination more glamorous than that of black and gold, so embrace the luxe and pair the two tones together in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Bright White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pure snow white of the origin deluxe in bright white has a matt appearance that is at odds with its smooth and streamlined feel. Teamed with matching, high quality components, including designer-style ladder tapes, this blind is a real style statement. Pit the bright white against a bold, focal feature wall, painted in a bright cobalt or dark navy. Alternatively, go for an attention-grabbing wallpaper to create the same effect.

products.title: Original, Citrus - Roller Blind
products.description: Mustard yellow-green and grey is a classic, not to mention on-trend, colour combination that never fails to catch the eye, and that's exactly what the original in citrus offers. With as much substance as style, the high quality off-white fabric is adept at filtering the light whilst offering privacy and a little shade. For a colourful lift in the morning, hand the citrus in the master bedroom, and accompany with soft greys and accenting yellows.

products.title: Original, Kakiiro - Roller Blind
products.description: Modern and funky, the original in kakiiro adds a bright splash of multicolour to any room. This cool filter blind is off-white with a high quality finish, and its well-made rolling mechanism makes it long-lasting and easy to use. Colour in the kitchen can be cheerful and welcoming, and we all need a little lift during those busy early mornings. Pair the kakiiro with taupe or pale blue walls and accessorise with red and orange.

products.title: Original, Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Loud and proud, the original in crimson is a treat to the eye, with its exciting mixture of oranges, reds, and taupes. Its off-white background means it keeps an air of simplicity, and the durable fabric is flexible and smooth, making for a functional and lasting filter blind. Team the crimson with colours in its palette to create a coordinated bedroom look, and accentuate with medium woods in the form of contemporary furniture.

products.title: Original, Plum - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft cream fabric of the original in plum offers a light-filtering background to muted lilacs, baby blues, and hushed plums, giving a homely yet modern feel. This stylish blind is placed on an easy-to-use roll mechanism, making it practical as well as pretty. For a light and airy look in the bedroom, go for cream walls to make the plum stand out on its own, and complement with colours already in the blind's palette.

products.title: Origin, Chocolate Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: This time in milky chocolate brown, the origin range provides stylish functionality, with its streamlined rail cassette, hidden controls, and sleek, sliding strips. The fabric itself is neatly woven, offering just the gentlest of texturing. Mix the chocolate brown with sage green tones for an outdoors-in look and feel in your home office. Treat yourself to a heavy oak desk and include warming fabrics in these two contrasting shades.

products.title: Origin, Mushroom - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin mushroom allows you to control the light and shade in your home with minimal effort, whilst at the same time adding a richly authentic aesthetic that gives every modern decorated home the homely touch. Look closer and you'll see the subtle patterning of the voile as it hangs elegantly in front of the fabric. Beiges, sandy browns, and lightly coloured leathers all work beautifully when placed against origin mushroom.

products.title: Origin, Grey - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin grey brings a modern light stone grey into your home and combines it with the clean and clear lines that only a contemporary vista blind can provide. Finely woven and expertly crafted, no matter how discerning your eye is you are guaranteed to appreciate the workmanship that goes into every square inch. The ability to give your room the perfect light levels all day long makes your kitchen a fantastic choice for origin grey.

products.title: Origin, Cream - Vista Blind
products.description: Give your home a touch of the crisp modern aesthetic with origin cream. A finely woven voile serves as the perfect companion for the rich creamy fabric which sits underneath and allows you to subtly adjust the light levels to frame your room exactly how the occasion requires. Cream adds a homely quality to your decor that allows you to introduce anything from a light washed out blue to a gentle stone grey as you craft a relaxing atmosphere to savour.

products.title: Origin, Cameo - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin cameo allows your eye to see something new the closer you study the care and craft that has gone into making it. A subtly patterned voile sits harmoniously with a finely detailed fabric that we call cameo. Far more than a walk on part, the unique vista design will allow your latest addition to take centre stage as it offers control of any room in the house as you effortlessly adjust the light.

products.title: Origin, Taupe - Vista Blind
products.description: A light beige fabric sits harmoniously below a matching voile to create the latest addition to their range of vista blinds. Lightweight and elegantly poised, every square inch is crafted with care to ensure that you add nothing but understated luxury to your home. If you want to give your home a touch of rustic country with a modern twist there is no better addition to make to your home than origin taupe.

products.title: Origin, Black - Vista Blind
products.description: A modern take on the classic roller blind, origin black allows you to add colour and light control to your home in a truly new way that will bring your decor to life. Lightweight and finely woven, every square inch of this premium fabric is accompanied by a subtly patterned voile. As the sun makes its way across the sky you can make the fine adjustments that allow you to keep the perfect balance of light and shade.

products.title: Origin, Plum - Vista Blind
products.description: Giving your home the finishing touches it deserves is all about adding style and substance in equal measure. Origin plum combines rich wholesome coloured fabric with an elegant voile that allows you to control the light levels in your room with ease. By bringing everything together in a series of clean modern cuts and lines the origin range allows you to give your home a truly modern touch of style.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Taupe - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).
